official-title.#text:
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to
		  reauthorize user fee programs relating to new animal drugs.

term.#text: process for the review of animal drug applications

text.#text: The term

The activities
				necessary for the review of animal drug applications, supplemental animal drug
				applications, and investigational animal drug submissions.

The issuance of
				action letters which approve animal drug applications or supplemental animal
				drug applications or which set forth in detail the specific deficiencies in
				animal drug applications, supplemental animal drug applications, or
				investigational animal drug submissions and, where appropriate, the actions
				necessary to place such applications, supplements, or submissions in condition
				for approval.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
review of pending animal drug applications, supplemental animal
				drug applications, and investigational animal drug submissions.

				animal drug establishments and other facilities undertaken as part of the

				research conducted in connection with the review of animal drug applications,

				submissions.

The development of
				regulations and policy related to the review of animal drug applications,
				supplemental animal drug applications, and investigational animal drug
				submissions.

Development of
				standards for products subject to review.

Meetings between
				the agency and the animal drug sponsor.

Review of
				advertising and labeling prior to approval of an animal drug application or
				supplemental animal drug application, but not after such application has been
				approved.
